events.message: I was involved in a car collision at the intersection yesterday afternoon and need to file a claim for damages.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description and vehicle involvement.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the claim process and next steps.
Your claim regarding the car accident has been acknowledged by our team and will be processed shortly.
Please provide the photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driverâ€™s license for further investigation.
All requested documents, including photos and police report, have been submitted for your auto accident claim.
The investigation into the details of the vehicle collision and liability has officially begun.
The investigation was completed, confirming damages consistent with your description of the auto accident.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and associated costs from the collision.
You have acknowledged the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the processing and offer.
Your auto accident claim has been formally approved after considering all submitted documents and investigation.
Payment for the approved auto claim damages was transferred to your account successfully today.
Your claim has now been closed following successful payment and conclusion of all required formalities.
The case file for your vehicle collision insurance claim has been archived for future reference and compliance.
